alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 21 at 2:53AM MDT until May 21 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, freezing temperatures as low as 32. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Yuma County. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM MDT this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. Be sure pets have adequate shelter from the cold.
